decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: Site Location Plan, 1398-1 (Existing Plans), 1398-2 (Proposed Plans).

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall be as per the submitted application form or approved drawings (Condition 2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), Policy DAA of Ealing's Local Plan (Reg.18), policies D3 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021) - sections 12 and 16.

| The hereby approved two rooflights to the northern roof slope shall not project more than 150mm from the plane of the roof slope when measured perpendicularly and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and to safeguard the character and appearance of the area in accordance with policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
description: Conversion of loft space into habitable use; installation of one rear facing window at loft level; and installation of two Velux windows to northern roofslope
